接口 org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggerRepository
的使用

  • 使用LoggerRepository的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.log4j
    The main log4j package.
    org.apache.log4j.helpers
    This package is used internally.
    org.apache.log4j.lf5  
    org.apache.log4j.net
    Package for remote logging.
    org.apache.log4j.spi
    Contains part of the System Programming Interface (SPI) needed to extend log4j.
    org.apache.log4j.varia
    Contains various appenders, filters and other odds and ends.
    org.apache.log4j.xml
    XML based components.

    • org.apache.log4j中LoggerRepository的使用

      实现LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Hierarchy
      This class is specialized in retrieving loggers by name and also maintaining the logger hierarchy.
      声明为LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected LoggerRepository Category.repository 
      返回LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static LoggerRepository Category.getDefaultHierarchy()
      已过时。 
      Please use LogManager.getLoggerRepository() instead.
      LoggerRepository Category.getHierarchy()
      已过时。 
      Please use Category.getLoggerRepository() instead.
      static LoggerRepository LogManager.getLoggerRepository() 
      LoggerRepository Category.getLoggerRepository()
      Return the the LoggerRepository where this Category is attached.
      参数类型为LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Read configuration options from url configURL.

      Read configuration options from properties.

      Read configuration from a file.

      Read configuration options from url configURL.
      protected void PropertyConfigurator.parseCatsAndRenderers(java.util.Properties props, LoggerRepository hierarchy)
      Parse non-root elements, such non-root categories and renderers.

    • org.apache.log4j.spi中LoggerRepository的使用

      实现LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j.spi中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  NOPLoggerRepository
      No-operation implementation of LoggerRepository which is used when LogManager.repositorySelector is erroneously nulled during class reloading.
      返回LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j.spi中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      LoggerRepository RepositorySelector.getLoggerRepository()
      Returns a LoggerRepository depending on the context.
      LoggerRepository DefaultRepositorySelector.getLoggerRepository() 
      参数类型为LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j.spi中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Interpret a resource pointed by a URL and set up log4j accordingly.
      参数类型为LoggerRepository的org.apache.log4j.spi中的构造器
